0.text: Hi there, welcome to the EAS - an emergency alert app. To start with, we have two questions. (1/2) What’s your name?

1.text: Thanks for the answer, one more question to go! (2/2) What’s your emergency contact’s phone number that we could reach if you're in danger?

2.text: Great, we are ready to go! Please remember to whitelist our number (318-536-6330) and let us know anytime you need to set an alarm! To set an alarm, text us an estimated travel time in the form of xm / xmin / yhxm

text.resp: Be safe! The app will check up on you in the set time. If you end your trip earlier, let us know that you are done!
text.check: Your trip is over! Please reply ok within 5 minutes so we know you are okay. Or we will send an alert message to your emergency contact.

4.text: Thanks for checking in! Text us again for another trip!

-1.text: Please resend your estimated out time in the format of xm / xmin / yhxm
